How can Verus be used to launch a new blockchain economy, token, or liquidity basket currency, and what benefits does it offer compared to other platforms?

Verus provides a platform for launching a new blockchain economy, token, or liquidity basket currency in a permissionless manner. This means that anyone can create and launch their own blockchain economy, token, or liquidity basket currency without needing permission from a central authority.

One of the key benefits of using Verus for launching a new blockchain economy, token, or liquidity basket currency is its ease of use and efficiency. Verus provides a set of tools and commands that allow users to quickly and easily create and launch their own blockchain economy, token, or liquidity basket currency. This is demonstrated by the example of how the Verus team launched a token on the old testnet, exported it to Ethereum's Goerli, and used it as a DAI proxy/simulant on the new testnet. This process was quick and efficient, showcasing the capabilities of Verus.

Another benefit of using Verus is its flexibility and versatility. Verus allows users to create a wide range of blockchain economies, tokens, and liquidity basket currencies, from simple tokens to complex DeFi baskets and even entire PBaaS blockchains. This flexibility makes Verus an ideal platform for a wide range of use cases, from crowdfunding and identity verification to launching entirely new blockchain economies.

Additionally, Verus offers a bridge to Verus and Ethereum from day 1, allowing for easy integration with existing blockchain ecosystems. This makes it easy to launch an Ethereum ERC20 token, DeFi basket, or even another PBaaS blockchain using Verus.

Overall, Verus provides a powerful and flexible platform for launching new blockchain economies, tokens, and liquidity basket currencies in a permissionless manner. Its ease of use, efficiency, and versatility make it an ideal choice for a wide range of use cases.

4) **Permissionless Chain, Token, and Liquidity Basket Currency Launches**: Whether you are looking to crowdfund an effort in a manner much like Kickstarter or IndieGoGo, sell identities to which you expect to add value or that are sub-IDs of a very cool root ID, or launch an entirely new blockchain economy and blockchain that starts with all of the Verus technology and a bridge to Verus and Ethereum from day 1, Verus is probably the best platform for you. In fact, as we were planning for the next testnet and wanted to have our own version of DAI to use in the bridge, since we want only decentralized currencies in the live mainnet bridge, we used a command to launch a token on the old testnet, exported it and all its supply to Ethereum’s Goerli on the existing bridge, and that will be the DAI proxy/simulant that we will use on the new testnet. It saved us all some time, proving that Verus PBaaS will also be the easiest, most efficient way to launch even an Ethereum ERC20, whether that ERC20 represents a token, DeFi basket, or even another PBaaS blockchain 🙂
